divs: Sighting Detailsat dusk a red lit is seen by my wife, going from east to east. when i got home at 1130 pm i saw it heading to the west. at 0200 we saw it agine heading east. and closer like its doing a grid pattern back and forth. am still looking for it to come back.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Brighton
There were no other sightings in Brighton on or around February 27th 2011
